title: Andrew Rose has put the main elements of the economic data used in his gravity estimates online (aggregated data on 1960–2000). The main underlying sources are, for trade, the IMF DOTS (a database going back to 1948) and, for GDP and populations
When the analysis focuses on a more refined disaggregation, the trade data are mainly drawn from the COMTRADE database of the United Nations
